verses.name: Isaiah 34:12
verses.text: They shall call the nobles thereof to the kingdom, but none shall be there, and all her princes shall be nothing.

verses.name: Isaiah 34:13
verses.text: And thorns shall come up in her palaces, nettles and brambles in the fortresses thereof: and it shall be an habitation of dragons, and a court for owls.

verses.name: Isaiah 34:14
verses.text: The wild beasts of the desert shall also meet with the wild beasts of the island, and the satyr shall cry to his fellow; the screech owl also shall rest there, and find for herself a place of rest.
